catalog.description: The calling and doctrinal contributions of Joseph Smith as well as the significance of modern scripture including key sections of the Doctrine and Covenants.  Also includes the establishment, organization, doctrine, and practices of the Church today.
catalog.title: Foundations of the Restoration.

dept_headers.header_text: No more than 4 hours of religion credit per semester may be counted toward the religion requirement.
